scripts.setup-env: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const content='NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=https://dummy.supabase.co\nNEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.dummy\n'; if(!fs.existsSync('ui')) fs.mkdirSync('ui'); fs.writeFileSync('ui/.env.local', content);"
scripts.install-all: npm run setup-env && npm install && cd ui && npm install && pip install openpyxl pandas numpy
